questions.question: The letter ___ by the secretary every day.
questions.explanation: Present Simple Passive: is/are + past participle.

questions.question: The house ___ in 1990.
questions.explanation: Past Simple Passive: was/were + past participle.

questions.question: A new school ___ next year.
questions.explanation: Future Simple Passive: will be + past participle.

questions.question: The books ___ by the teacher now.
questions.explanation: Present Continuous Passive: is/are being + past participle.

questions.question: The report ___ already ___.
questions.explanation: Present Perfect Passive: has/have been + past participle.

questions.question: Many emails ___ yesterday.
questions.explanation: Past Simple Passive with plural subject.

questions.question: This song ___ by the Beatles.
questions.explanation: Use Past Simple Passive for completed past actions.

questions.question: The windows ___ tomorrow.
questions.explanation: Future Passive: will be + past participle.

questions.question: The museum ___ every Monday.
questions.explanation: Present Simple Passive for regular actions.

questions.question: All the cakes ___ by Anna.
questions.explanation: Past Simple Passive with plural object.

questions.question: The parcel ___ yet.
questions.explanation: Present Perfect Passive in negative form.

questions.question: The room ___ when I arrived.
questions.explanation: Past Continuous Passive: was/were being + past participle.
